skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video captures a beautiful tropical location from the water. The shot begins at the surface, showing a lush, mountainous island under a blue sky with white clouds. The camera then dips underwater, revealing a clear, turquoise world with a rocky and sandy seabed.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery video captures a beautiful tropical location from the water. The shot begins at the surface, showing a lush, mountainous island under a blue sky with white clouds. The camera then dips underwater, revealing a clear, turquoise world with a rocky and sandy seabed.
